name: Furry Friend
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You summon a Small or smaller beast such as a dog, squirrel, or monkey. It obeys your mental commands for the duration. You can use 1 AP to blind yourself and see through its eyes.

The summoned beast is not a combatant, and will flee from all danger until the battle ends. It has 1 HP and AC 13. It vanishes if reduced to 0 HP, ending the spell early.
